head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WARNER, AARON W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WARNER, AARON W.

block.p: WARNER-Aaron W. Husband of Miriam. Father of Abby Myerson and Rachel Warner. Father-in-law of Edward Cook & Allan Myerson. Grandfather of Kevin, Eric, and Gregg Myerson and Alex, Jenny, and Kelly Cook. Brother of Miriam Rosen. Memorial service to be held at Columbia University Oct. 12 at 2 PM. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Aaron W. Warner Scholarship Fund at the School of General Studies at Columbia University.

WARNER-Aaron W. Husband of Miriam. Father of Abby Myerson and Rachel Warner. Father-in-law of Edward Cook & Allan Myerson. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Aaron W. Warner Scholarship Fund at the School of General Studies at Columbia University.
